definitions: лет is the genitive plural form of лето (leto), meaning 'summer' or 'year'. In this form, it often translates to 'years' when counting or expressing age.
лет can also be a short form of лететь (letet'), meaning 'to fly', but this is less common without further context.
examples: Ему десять лет. (He is ten years old.)
Сколько тебе лет? (How old are you?)
Прошло много лет. (Many years have passed.)
